sentences.cn: 舞弊行为包括受贿, 请客拉拢.

sentences.en: He was found guilty of bribery and corruption (=  bribery and dishonest behaviour  ) .
sentences.cn: 他被判犯有贿赂和徇私舞弊罪。

sentences.en: He was in detention in connection with the bribery affair.
sentences.cn: 他因与贿赂事件有牵连而被拘留了.

sentences.en: He was jailed on charges of bribery.
sentences.cn: 他因受到行贿指控而被捕入狱。

sentences.en: His specialty's bribery, but he's just throwing your money away by the handful!
sentences.cn: 他的本领就是花钱去收买! 他把三叔的钱不心疼的乱花!

sentences.en: Mr. A charged Mr. B with bribery and Mr. B countercharged Mr. A with slander.
sentences.cn: 某甲控诉某乙受贿,而某乙反诉某甲诽谤.

sentences.en: She was arrested on bribery charges.
sentences.cn: 她因被控贿赂罪而遭逮捕。

sentences.en: Some used force, bribery and guile to achieve their wealth and power.
sentences.cn: 一些人使用武力, 行贿和种种诡计来攫取财富和权力.

sentences.en: The charges against him include fraud, bribery, and falsifying business records.
sentences.cn: 对他的指控包括诈骗、行贿和伪造商业记录。

sentences.en: The policeman accused the thief of bribery.
sentences.cn: 警察指控那个小偷行贿.

sentences.en: The witness in the bribery investigation refused to name names.
sentences.cn: 在贿赂案的调查中,证人不肯指名道姓.

sentences.en: This confession implicates numerous officials in the bribery scandal.
sentences.cn: 这一供认会使许多官员牵连到受贿的丑事中.

sentences.en: To dodge the draft, he tried bribery.
sentences.cn: 为逃避兵役, 他施行贿赂.

sentences.en: We tried everything – persuasion, bribery, threats.
sentences.cn: 我们什么都试过——劝过，给过好处，也威胁过。
